title: Stadionul Cetate (Deva)
text: Stadionul Cetate is a multi-use <a href="stadium">stadium</a> in <a href="Deva%2C%20Romania">Deva</a>, <a href="Romania">Romania</a>. It is currently used mostly for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches and is the home ground of <a href="LPS%20Cetate%20Deva">Cetate Deva</a>. The stadium was opened in the 1960s and holds 4,000 seats. Cetate Stadium is ranked 3rd in <a href="Hunedoara%20County">Hunedoara County</a>, by capacity and is well known in Romania for its special location, right at the foot of the hill on which the Deva Citadel is located.
